title: Shutter v1.4
description:
Shutter is a amazing escape game!
Shutter is a pretty scary game!
Shutter will challenge your brain!
Shutter will give you the heart-pounding challenge!

In this game, you should capture the ghost with your camera and solve dozens of puzzles.

You woke up in a haunted hotel. You forgot everything, you even don't know who you are and where you come from. A stranger in black appeared and gave you a Polaroid. He told you all you have to do is to kill the ghost with your Polaroid and escape all of this. Are you ready? 

Use your talents to escape the hotel and find out who you are.
Be careful!

- Not suitable for easily scared people!!! -

More info:
